kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance. Use this keyword for quick experiments or debugging sessions.
kw.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Types the given key combination into element found by ``selector``.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
